ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 121
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Im ... in ... a ... across ... have ... That sounds like a great idea.  I m just a level 11 warrior and would love to know higher levels tales on how they
ygData.messageBody:
> Daks,
>
> Thanks for the reply. Im sorry to hear that the list is really slow, but
Im
> not surprised. With so many people, like yourself, achieving the upper
> levels information is abundant in-game. I guess what Im most interested
in
> is hearing from people like yourself who might have a story, a suggestion,
a
> pitfall to avoid, a strategy, a nice area to hunt, etc etc. As a 47th
> Warrior I imagine you have seen just about all there is to see and do
across
> Norrath. Id love to share your adventures, what suggestions you might
have
> for those higher level hunts and adventures.
>
That sounds like a great idea. I'm just a level 11 warrior and would love
to know
higher levels tales on how they got there. Maybe we can all share a story
on
our adventures.

That was a great story Bruener, I too was thinking to hunting in East
Commonlands.
But every time I do, it seems that I'm Griffen or the big snake (drak
something or other)
bait.

Let me ask you all this Has anyone done the Quest in Hogcaller's Inn?
You have to talk to Lady She ( elf ) give her wine ( white ) and she tells
you that someone in room two is in with the dark elfs. Then you have to
go and find a key to get the mail from the inn keeper ( which I missed, I
just could not find the key ) You then have to kill the halfing woman
( Shintl Lowbrow ) you get her head and a note. That that back
to the guy who started the quest ( near the forge in warrior building )
he tells you to go to Toala in the Areana. She wants you to kill the
halfing and her drow helper.

My question is this - who is the helper. I hate to try to kill all the dark
elfs in the city.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Ok here is my story for the week.

Walking around North Ro, I happen to get lost. Which is something
that I do very offen. Tears fell from my eyes when I could not see
the grasslands. But taking a deep breath and a praying to the
Warlord, I made my way slowing around hopeing to see water or
grass. Then by luck I happen across a Giant Desert Spider.

An horror if ever I saw one, all those red eye and hairy legs
stills gives me the shivers as I look on one. With a war yell
I ran to the beast. Meaning to destory it.

Not knowing that I was the hunted as well as the hunter, a puma
came on me and taged teamed with the spider. Being that I'm not
that brave I ran for it. Hopeing to make it to the grasslands.

With them hot on my tail I ran, for my life was on the line. As
as I just made it to the grasslands I took my stand - I could not
run anymore. With sword in hand I prayed to the Warlord for
help.

And in his kindness he send it to me, in the form of drawf. Never
have the race looked so handsome to me. How strong and brave
he was to help me take on these beasts. With a few blows of his
mighty axe the spider landed at my feet. He watched me take on
the puma, making sure that I did not need any help with it.

After the beasts where killed and the blood lust in my eye faded,
I looked around for my friend. Wanting to thank him, give him a
hug for saveing this poor foolish human female. But he was
gone.

With tears in my eyes I fell down and thanked the Warlord for his
gift and hoped that he would always watch over th drawf that aided
me.


Thanks everyone and have a Happy Thanksgiving.
Ranala Level 11 Warrior on Prexus Server, The Crying Warrior
